snippet: The liquor producer Brown-Forman is putting Campbell Brown, a descendant of its founder, in charge of its original whiskey, Old Forester bourbon.
abstract: Campbell Brown, a descendent of company's founder, will become president of Old Forester bourbon at liquor producer Brown-Forman.
lead_paragraph: The liquor producer Brown-Forman is putting Campbell Brown, a descendant of its founder, in charge of its original whiskey, Old Forester bourbon.

headline.main: Scion of Liquor Company to Lead Old Forester Bourbon
headline.print_headline: Scion of Liquor Company to Lead Old Forester Bourbon
